name: Nothing But Games 2
description:
There's nothing better than some arcade games during free time!

This is the second edition of Nothing But Games, which features a variety of new games for you to play! There are 10 new games. Below is a full list of all the games featured in Nothing But Games 2.

-Infinite Jumprope

-Ball Fall

-Find It

-Falling Room

-Fruity Bombs

-Tic Tac Toe

-Wonder The Word

-
